pageProduct.name: Andalou Clear Skin Blemish Vanish Gel 18ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex with argan stem cells, willow bark, salicylic acid, and camphor extracts instantly go to work to help calm inflammation, combat blemishes below the surface, and speed recovery for a clean, clear complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Blemish Gel For Active & Oily Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin, Ethyl Alcohol*, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate*, Fruit Stem Cells (Argan, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract*, Spiraea Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Extract*, Epilobium Angustifolium (Willow Herb) Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Zinc Gluconate, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Tocopherol, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Lavandula Officinalis (Lavender) Flower Extract*, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Cinnamomum Camphora (Camphor) Bark Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

AM & PM. Apply to clean skin. Massage a small amount of gel on blemish prone areas and spots. Follow with moisturizer.
